Thereâ€™s voice head constantly whispering things like: â€œThink deeper.â€ â€œFix others miss.â€ â€œBreak pattern.â€ â€œBe better.â€ â€œStay curious.â€ â€œDonâ€™t quit, today.â€ â€œObsess till makes sense.â€ voice made chase everything marine biology nuclear physics, mythology nanotech medicine. yeah, Iâ€™m aware makes sound like Iâ€™m building villain origin story, swear Iâ€™m good side. days. **What looking for?** Someone who's real. Someone who's afraid say, "Hey, feel weird today, talk?" pen pal. 2-week responder. ghost. Justâ€¦ human. friend. Someone talk life with, messy, complicated, unfiltered life. Someone sees meaning tiny things. line song. random fact. memory didnâ€™t realize still carried. Someone go laughing memes dropping â€œwhat even point existence?â€ without skipping beat. donâ€™t need perfect. honest. soulâ€™s little lonely lately, get it. Watch movies together, overanalyze characters like weâ€™re writing therapy notes. Talk anything like science, myths, dreams, weird YouTube theories, life death, fictional characters wish real. Build little world. inside jokes. safe space. wonâ€™t lie, intense sometimes. bad way, just... focused. love learning stuff, mastering things people usually give on. take pride understanding tiny details, seeing patterns others miss. Maybe thatâ€™s diagnostician me, maybe itâ€™s brainâ€™s wired. think emotionally intelligent, driven, slightly over-analytical weird flex, Iâ€™m leaning it. Itâ€™s hurt still showing kindness. Iâ€™ve ghosted past self Iâ€™m going back him. Iâ€™m building someone better now. youâ€™re... little broken healing Kind naÃ¯ve Intelligent arrogant Funny also deep hell mix chaotic curiosity quiet introspection â€¦then maybe weâ€™ll get along stupidly well. someone needs consistent, loyal, nerdy companion talk literally anything structure mitochondria Studio Ghibli makes us cryâ€”I got you. yeahâ€¦ leap. masks. filters. me. Iâ€™ll know itâ€™s you. â€œWeâ€™re stories end. make good one, yeah?â€ Waiting, â€“ Diagnostician Search Watson
